channel.title: Mobile theme add report button/'home' button fix
channel.description:
Really needs to be a report post button on the mobile theme so that some of us mobile browsers can actually report rather than only posting "not allowed" and hoping a mod finds it.
Also the 'Home' button in the theme basically only refreshes the page, it doesnt actually bring you home.

item.title: Mobile theme add report button/'home' button fix
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:13, topic:531122”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=649886.msg4372814#msg4372814 date=1381200743]

New suggestion: remove the mobile theme entirely because of how buggy it is

God no, I live in an area that isnt even at 3G yet, without the mobile theme i would hardly be able to get, and when I did would hardly be for a second. The regular still takes a while to load on Edge connection, and the mobile theme is a snap.
[/quote]Ahh I understand, I wish there was a way to disable mobile themes entirely.[/quote]
Change your UserAgent to desktop.

Read full topic
item.source: Mobile theme add report button/'home' button fix
